stories.name: Configuration | Agent Management - UX and Functional Enhancement

1. Labels should be in Human Readable Format - I saw the labels can be updated in the code
2. All fields do not be editable, fields that are informative should be un-editable

stories.name: Insights agent - Rally agent not failing and not recording error message in health check in case of authentication failure
stories.description:
It has been observed that Rally agent doesn't record a health node in case of authentication failure, even though it logs it. Health check page shows 'Success' message. Agent should log such messages in Neo4j as well as log file. 2019-06-11 16:25:33,142 - ERROR - BaseAgent.py - 395 - execute - RestFacade: Unsupported response code 403, url: https://rally1.rallydev.com/slm/webservice/v2.0/subscription, response received: Error 403 CA Agile Central Password Has Expired

HTTP ERROR 403

Problem accessing /slm/webservice/v2.0/subscription. Reason: 

    CA Agile Central Password Has Expired

Powered by Jetty://

stories.name: Agent Tool Credential Failure/Expired doesn't show any error log in Health Check Page
stories.description:
During implementation of Pizza Hut, We've observed that  Agent Tool Credential Failure/Expired doesn't show any error log in Health Check Page,. It doesn't add any log message in the corresponding Agent log file.

1.  We need to add this use case in the log file. This will help user to make aware of password failure.

2. Pizza Hut customers requested to add this feature along with a mail trigger to corresponding support DL.

stories.name: Password Reset / Retrieval for Insights
stories.description:
At this time we do not have any functionality in our Insights to reset or retrieve the password.

**Use Case - Single Sign ON** - We need to provide a message (Forgot Password - please use the organizations password system)

**Use Case - Custom Password** - Either have a link to reset / retrieve password OR Please contact your admin (with mailto: link) to reset your password) 
PS: Can customer request for  login configuration - like what Vishwajit demoed for Grafana?

labels.name: insights - revamped ui based on new branding standards.

stories.name: Documentation - Template to gather customer requirement
stories.description:
**In last few stand up calls it has been observed that**

1. The hardware is not configured as per Help Pages
2. H/W configuration leading to excess time in software installation 
3. Many times proper access and rights have not been provided 
4. Post configuration of Insights - additional help is requested and that leads to escalation
5. Ports are not opened prior to Configuring Insights
6. Many times boxes are not available over internet and we need to install Apache 2 to configure reverse proxy
7. Agent Tool credentials and accesses are not granted on time
8. Tools get added post Insights Installation
9. No defined limit of support from our team
10. Type of KT to be provided is not restricted 
11. Type of data - existing or fresh - migration leads to issues and increased support

This is impacting the deliverable and again leads to escalations. 

**Proposal**
1. Quick walk through of our help pages during demo
2. Educate customer on limit of our support
3. Detailed requirement Document
4. Change Request Form
5. Checklist of Infrastructure
6. Essential video links to be shared prior to KT and KT mostly limited to Q&A 
7. Educate customer about no SMTP support at this time

stories.name: Spinnaker Setup and Review
stories.description:
In order to provide cloud agnostic pipelines and provide capabilities it has been decided to evaluate Spinnaker to see what capabilities it can bring to the table. 

The goal is to recreate the setup with Spinnaker and see if we can deploy atleast 2 or 3 sample applications with microservices to cloud providers - AWS & Azure. 

The goal is to understand the capabilities and see if it can be plugged as the default pipeline of choice for customers trying to move to different cloud providers. 

Also see if we can give them default templates for different cloud - so that this could be packaged as 2.0. Also we need to highlight what would be our differentiators - just doing a white label of spinnaker will not help.

stories.name: Data Dictionary - UX + Functional Enhancement (Tool selection)
stories.description:
http://insights.cogdevops.com:8080/app/#/InSights/Home
1. No properties found for selected tool - Label:(SCM:GIT) 

This may not happen in real life scenario - however, if it does happen does that mean that the tool was not configured properly? If yes should we ask the user to Edit/Update the Tool with no properties through Agent Management? 

___________________________

http://34.236.204.95:8080/beta/#/InSights/Home
1. GIT Properties - Label:(SCM:GIT) (no properties listed)
2. DUMMYDATA Properties - Label:(DUMMY:DUMMYDATA) - has properties listed
3. No Correlations found between the selected tools:(GIT:DUMMYDATA)

In this instance there were no properties listed under GIT, hence "Click to Show Correlation" should not have been active. 

___________________________

http://insights.cogdevops.com:8080/app/#/InSights/Home
1. Both Tools has properties but there is no co-relation
2. No Correlations found between the selected tools:(GIT:SONAR)

Could we add a message saying Please click on "Reset Selected Tools" to clear the existing selection and select different sets of tools to see the Correlation.

_________________________

What happens when the user sees the Correlation - how does he know that he needs to reset the tools to see new correlation?
Suggestion - Please click on "Reset Selected Tools" to clear the existing selection and select different sets of tools to view the Correlation.

labels.name: insights - revamped ui based on new branding standards.

stories.name: Data Dictionary UX enhancement - Add Reset Button
stories.description:
When the user selects 2 tools and in the event there is no option for the user to "clear the selection"
- Clicking on Data Dictionary main menu link does not refresh the page
- Clicking the refresh button on browser takes the user to the landing page
- Or the User has to go to some other menu and come back to Data Dictionary - this is difficult to explain to user

Solution: We can add a Button "Reset the Selected Tools" - that way the user knows that both tools will be reset - Clear selection may lead to confusion of which of the tools would get reset, alternatively we can give a tool tip - Reset Tool 1 and Tool 2. 

I have attached a screen to show position of the button.

labels.name: insights - revamped ui based on new branding standards.

stories.name: Insights: Sonar Agent Changes
stories.description:
As part of Kaiser Implementation - there is a need to tag the details of the code quality metrics with the Sonar Project details so that we are able to show the trend of the code quality over a period of time. This functionality will also help other customers and hence it is vital that is part of the SONAR agent of the core product. 

The changes would be done in the Kaiser environment and from there the changes would be integrated to the main product branch.

stories.name: Insights: Spike - Spilt of Data for enabling Horizontal Scalability.
stories.description:
In order to allow large enterprise customers store more amount of Data inside Neo4j and enable customers to create aggregation using that data - Insights should have the capability to horizontally scale and we intend to use data split approaches to solve the problem

The spike is to understand the options which are available and also to recommend what should be the approach we should be taking and what would be the changes needed in the various components of Insights. 

Expectations 

Ability to spilt the data into 3 or more Buckets based on time frame. 
First bucket - Hot bucket which will have the most recent data 
Second Bucket - Warm Bucket which will have data a little older than hot bucket but newer than the cold bucket
Third Bucket - Cold Bucket will have really old data. 

These buckets could be spilt across multiple neo4j instances. Following are the use cases for which the approach is needed. 

Data classification - How do we move data between the buckets configured and what will happen to the relationships during the data movement. 

Data Search - When data is being searched and if the query involves a timeframe which is spanning across multiple buckets of data how will the query and the service behaves. 

Spike should have approach for the following 

Configurations for the data buckets
Where and how will the data classification happen and it's impact on relationships between the existing data
How the search query work and what are the changes needed at the platform service level.

stories.name: Insights - Agents 2.0 - Windows Installation Package to be updated
stories.description: Ensure that the windows installation package works seamlessly with the latest 4.2 version changes and Agents 2.0 installation is successful

stories.name: Insights - Data Purging Feature Release
stories.description:
In order to limit the size of the growing records in Neo4j  - it is necessary to purge the records in Neo4j by moving them to flat file based on a configurable timestamp. 

The feature should be part of the admin activities and it should also have the capability to restore the data back to Neo4j if needed. 

Also the feature should have clear documentation in the confluence link which should be self explanatory and users should be able to use the functionality with minimal support.
